programme.desc: The challenge set for the remaining contestants is a blind taste test, with the winning team heading off on a trip to Sea World.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Three Michelin-starred chefs judge a lobster dish cooked by the contestants as the challenge, with a prize of having caviar at a top restaurant at stake.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are challenged to create a dish with as much consideraton for presentation as taste, with the winner receiving a makeover and photoshoot.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a 1923 C-Cab and a client with hoarder tendencies. Pulling out all the stops, Ian attempts to create a vintage style tow truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a mini-kit van into a crazy utility vehicle.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on one of his biggest challenges yet as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the challenge as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on two Ford Falcon projects. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of the two Ford Falcons. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Andromeda: Forced Perspective
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Sum of Its Parts
programme.desc: Andromeda is boarded by a drone from the Consensus of Parts, a mythical mechanical society. While friendly at first, the drone tries to force the ship to join the Consensus.

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.desc: Gerentex is back, and demands Trance and Harper help him with his new scheme: finding Tarn-Vedra.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Honey Offering
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to bring peace to two different Nietzschean prides by escorting the princess of one to her arranged marriage to the prince of the other.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Seeking Siegfried
programme.desc: Katikati man Siegfried Newman disappeared on February 25, 2008, after he had dropped his sons Thomas, 9, and Oliver, 7, at Pahoia School. Police carried out a three-day search but found no sign of him.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Moorhouse Horrors / The Call Girl Killing
programme.desc: We investigate the story of David and Catherine Birnie, Australia's most sadistic husband and wife killing team, who tortured, raped and murdered four women in 1986.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Evil Heart: The Murder of Donna Wheeler
programme.desc: The bloodied, semi-naked body of 30-year-old Donna Wheeler is discovered by her estranged husband Keith Bond and 12-year-old son.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Divided We Stand
programme.desc: Kate falls for Mitch, an ex-army mate of Riley's with a dark secret. Stevie is forced to leave Drovers Run, when Grace accuses her of disloyalty. Riley makes a dangerous enemy when he rejects Ashleigh's advances.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Riley discovers his best mate Mitch is trading in stolen army weapons. Blinded by love, Kate helps her new beau Mitch hide from the police. A dangerous beast is killing Drovers stock.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Grace takes drastic action to capture a cattle thief. The girls uncover Ashleigh's plan to bankrupt Drovers Run. But can they stop her before it's too late?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Grace faces an uphill battle to save Ashleigh's life, after they are involved in a serious car accident on an isolated road. An expensive stud bull is murdered on Drovers Run, and the girls are convinced someone is trying to bankrupt them.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Grace is shocked when Heath proposes marriage. Will she accept? The girls host a spectacular medieval pageant to raise money for Drought Relief.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Grace takes drastic action to capture a cattle thief. The girls uncover Ashleigh's plan to bankrupt Drovers Run. But can they stop her before it's too late?

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Inn of the Dead
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Cape Cod to investigate the Orleans Inn. Some of the claims here are that candles light on their own, glasses slide off tables, and hauntings by two separate men who hung themselves.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Star Island
programme.desc: The TAPS team braves the wintery waters of the Atlantic to investigate Star Island off of the coast of Portsmouth, NH.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Bloodiest 47 Acres
programme.desc: TAPS is called out to Jefferson City, Missouri, to investigate the notorious Missouri State Penitentiary. A prison that was once named one of the most violent prisons in America.Riots, stabbings and executions left thousands dead over the years.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Camp Fear
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Jason and TAPS go to camp! They head to Camp Rutledge in Georgia where a woman has experienced paranormal activity since she was a teenager.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 10
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: On Vancouver Island’s challenging 75 kilometre West Coast hiking Trail, heavy fog hinders Parks Canada rescue efforts.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A late night mission turns strange for Penticton and Nelson Search and Rescue when the surviving witness is cuffed on an outstanding arrest warrant.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In British Columbia’s Fraser Valley, Kent Harrison Search and Rescue respond to a late night SOS for missing hikers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Military and civilian Search and Rescue team up for a major SAR exercise.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR is en-route to rescue a snowmobiler who’s crashed and tumbled 35 metres down a mine shaft.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Penticton SAR helicopter long lines a driver off the roof of his car in the middle of an icy river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR searches for two military pilots who crashed a T-33 jet in the Callaghan Valley. But there’s a catch… the pilots have been missing for over 50 years.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR enlists bystanders to help rescue an injured man perched on a log in the middle of a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison SAR works into the night to locate and extricate a paraglider hanging 30 metres up a tree in the forest.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams say goodbye to fallen SAR member Sheilah Sweatman.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Ex
programme.desc: Andwela and Nicole came together after cheating on their spouses. Nicole feels like their marriage has been severely damaged due to his disloyalty and him trash talking her to his ex. Can this couple figure it out?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Track Me Down
programme.desc: Briana is suspicious of Geovani because she claims he is way too sexual and can’t keep his hands off her. She thinks that if he has that much drive for her, how could he not have it for other women.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Caught with Their Pants Down
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy's relationship takes a strange turn on a repo that puts them face-to-face with two strangers caught with their pants down. Then, Lou and Lyndah head to a remote ranch where they confront a duo of indecent roughnecks.

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Class Clown
programme.desc: Matt and Froy are sent on a wild goose chase around LA for a mini-van, and when they find their debtor selling contraband out of the trunk Matt is further convinced that Lyndah has been scheming against him.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Reading, Painting, and Physical Education
programme.desc: Will a frying pan-wielding housewife stop Lou and Sonia from getting their car? Plus, a repo involving a truck filled with black market contraband goes horrifyingly wrong for Matt and Froy.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Business Issues
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou deal with a terrible boss and his instigating employees. Next, Lou, Froy, and Lyndah deal with a debtor with issues when they take possession of a taco truck. And Finally, Matt, Lou, and Sonia take on a big repo at a dealership and...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Instruction and Destruction
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof
programme.desc: Today, Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. When the adrenaline-fueled arrest goes down, every family member will play a critical role.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: And Baby Makes Three
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: The Game: Baby Come Back
programme.desc: The new coach seems more interested in getting to know Kelly than with making a new deal with Jason.

programme.title: The Game: Baby On Board
programme.desc: Melanie finally confesses to Derwin that she is in love with him, but soon after, Derwin tells her about Janay's pregnancy.

programme.title: The Game: Mel-Odrama
programme.desc: Melanie has a confrontation with Janay when she thinks that Janay may be lying about her pregnancy with Derwin's baby.

programme.title: The Game: Just When I Thought I Was Out, She Pulls Me Back In
programme.desc: While Rick is ready to make their relationship public, Tasha refuses to do so and goes out of her way to keep it a secret from their co-workers.

programme.title: The Game: Just The Three Of Us
programme.desc: Melanie feels jealous after Derwin goes with Janay to her first pregnancy appointment.

programme.title: Run's House: Chicks Fly the Coop
programme.desc: Run's blood boils upon finding that his backyard pool house has become filled with family junk. He vows to clean it out, which unleashes conflict with every family member who wants to hang onto some possession.

programme.title: Run's House: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: Run often talks about how much he loves to win, but it's not until we see his family compete against one another that we understand that the drive to dominate runs thick in the Simmons blood.

programme.title: Run's House: JoJo Wins and Justine Loses
programme.desc: After overindulging at Russell Simmons' remarkable star-studded charity bash in the Hamptons, Justine decides to go on a diet. Determined to make it work, she enlists the help of a personal trainer.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Family Vacation
programme.desc: When Vanessa gets a call from her Ford modeling agent to do a fashion shoot in Colorado, Run decides that bringing the family along for a summer vacation would be the perfect adventure to share before school starts.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Fever
programme.desc: Looking at baby photos sparks Justine's desire to have another baby. Rev Run tries to convince Justine otherwise, but she is certain about what she wants.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction
programme.desc: PRS investigates the Campbell House, where the Innkeeper and guests claim to have sexual encounters with a spirit who has deep ties to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Beer, Wine and Spirits
programme.desc: Brian's bar has a cranky customer who's got a bad habit of breaking wine glasses. Charlie has been dead since prohibition.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: The education block of HMP Gloucester is an eerie set of corridors and empty rooms. Stuart enters for the first time and gradually realises that something is there with him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P1
programme.desc: Said to be the Most Haunted prison in the UK, HMP Dorchester is a scary place to be with a group of people but alone it becomes terrifying. Karl investigates the upper cells and gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P2
programme.desc: Stuart enters the underbelly of this remarkable building and starts to witness some very strange occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the very haunted school room in the large imposing Gressenhall Workhouse. The activity starts even before Karl gets into the building and becomes one of the most impressive investigations to date.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates two buildings, a forge and the cottage. He could not have imagined the activity that unfolded around him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt1
programme.desc: The formidable visage of Guys Cliff House, a once great home, is awe inspiring, as are the stories pf paranormal activity within. Now home to the Masonic fraternity it is home to two temples and many lodges and chapters.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt2
programme.desc: The lower Temple in this once great, but now ruined castle, is steeped in history and tales pf ghostly happenings. Stuart investigates a room that is said to house multiple spirits and feels something is watching him in the dark.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswana’s Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coasts
programme.desc: Along coasts, one element ends and another begins. No two days are ever the same on a coastline: the only thing that remains a constant is the timeless power of the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Extreme Animals
programme.desc: Extreme Animals features environments hostile to humans, but havens to many animals. Witness gorgeous glow-worms, high flying condors, parched thorny devils, emperor penguins, and polar bears in this journey through life on the edge.

programme.title: Arthur: Get Smart/Baby Steps
programme.desc: Everyone loves HUGO--the new interactive whiteboard that claims to be 100% accurate. If only Mr. Ratburn knew how to use it. Mei Lin can say "hello" AND play the piano?!? Kate can't even wave!

programme.title: Arthur: George Scraps His Sculpture/Arthur's Big Meltdown
programme.desc: George creates a piece of art for the county-wide art show with the help of guest artist Kevin Sampson. Then, Arthur must learn how to control his temper after getting angry over a pair of sneakers!

programme.title: Arthur: Kids Are From Earth, Parents Are From Pluto/Nerves Of Steal
programme.desc: It’s Lakewood Elementary Parents Open House! How will the kids survive a whole evening of their parents' embarrassing antics? Buster is the only kid in Elwood City who doesn't have a Cybertoy, so he decides to 'borrow' one from the store.

programme.title: Arthur: Dear Adil/Bitzi's Break-Up
programme.desc: Arthur is worried that his letters to his new Turkish pen pal, Adil, will be boring. After all, how can Elwood City compare to Arthur's fantastical ideas about Turkey? Bitzi is breaking up with her boyfriend, and Buster is really sad.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Thinks Big/Arthur Cleans Up
programme.desc: Once again, Arthur gets to do everything. Mostly he gets to carry the ring in Aunt Lucy's wedding. Elwood City's park is in sad shape, and after grumbling about it, the kids find themselves volunteered to clean it up.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Stray Netkitin/Bats in the Belfry
programme.desc: D.W. is panicked when a virus ruins the Read family computer. Who will take care of her virtual pet? Arthur and D.W. are thrilled when Grandma Thora lets them turn her attic into a clubhouse. But will a bat threaten their new play space?

programme.title: Arthur: What Is That Thing?/Buster's Best Behavior
programme.desc: Arthur and friends are all faced with seemingly impossible tasks, from fixing a model biplane to babysitting D.W. And, Buster knows he's fun, but he's beginning to feel like he's not particularly good at anything.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Makes Waves/It Came From Beyond
programme.desc: With the community pool closed for repairs and the temperature on the rise, Arthur and D.W. need a place to keep cool. Then, Grandma Thora takes in a stray: an adorable little dog named...Killer?

programme.title: Arthur: Ants in Arthur's Pants/Don't Ask Muffy
programme.desc: To excel in science, the class has to prove that they have P.A.N.T.S.--the ability to be patient, attentive, nosy, thoughtful, and systematic. And Muffy starts an advice column to launch her career as a rich and famous talk-show host.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: By the end of the war the RAF had aircraft that could escort bombers to targets deep inside Germany and back. With the Gloster Meteor, the RAF had also entered the ‘Jet Age’. Aircraft like the Hawker Hunter and F-86 Sabre took the RAF supersonic.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The 1920s and 30s were uncertain times for the RAF as well as all other armed services. With peace came cuts in spending on new aircraft development.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The series begins before WWI when military commanders struggled to understand what uses aviation might have. The Wright Brothers had been the first to fly a powered aircraft in controlled flight in 1903, but even by 1914 aircraft were still underpowered.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Franz Stangl & Gustav Wagner
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how Nazi hunter Simon Wiesenthal tracked down fugitive war criminal Franz Stangl in Brazil. Stangl was responsible for the murder of over 800,000 people.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Paul Touvier
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how French investigators hunted down Paul Touvier a pro-Nazi sympathizer who was responsible for murdering both Jews and resistance fighters.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Nev and Max embark on their biggest case as they track down the infamous Shelly Chartier to uncover truths about the celeb catfishing of Paris Roxanne and NBA star Chris Andersen. (S6, ep12)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Kristen
programme.desc: Mike met Kristen on Facebook. They quickly forged a deep connection, but Mike's frequent efforts to meet Kristen have been futile. Will Mike finally get face-to-face with Kristen? (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jen & Skylar
programme.desc: After being bullied in her past, Jen relies on online communities to establish relationships. After meeting Skylar online, they immediately hit it off. But they've never met in person! (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Nick & Melissa
programme.desc: Nick and Melissa fell in love at age 12 when they met on an online chat room. Now 18, Nick is ready to meet Melissa. But is Melissa the real deal or has Nick been entangled in lies?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lucille & Kidd Cole
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for music producer Kidd Cole. Companies were never paid and one day Kidd couldn't be found. Will she get the answers she needs?

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Ex on the Beach
programme.desc: Tensions between Sam and Marty come to a head. A new arrival sends the twins into battle and could spell trouble for John and Georgia! (S7, ep9)

programme.title: Ex on the Beach
programme.desc: The party comes to a dramatic end as a familiar face arrives to cause chaos in the villa. Will it be too much for John and Georgia and will Chloe finally have her wicked way with Sam? (S7, ep10)

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: The Beach of Doom
programme.desc: Eight sexy singles arrive at a tropical beach paradise only to discover that they are on Ex on the Beach and they are about to be confronted with the ghosts of their past.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 107
programme.desc: Jeremy plans a picnic to confess his deep affection for his best friend Amanda. Self-proclaimed ladies' man Nate thinks he's finally found a girl to make him quit his partying ways.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 108
programme.desc: Angelica attempts to steal her best friend John away from his current girlfriend. Shivani reveals her true feelings to BFF Parth.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 109
programme.desc: Katy wants to make her friend of 8 years, Brian, her boyfriend. Jackie reveals her heart to her best friend Ed right before his rock show.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 110
programme.desc: After going to the last two proms with Taylor as friends, Polly is ready to upgrade her relationship. Stephanie wants to retire her party girl image and ask Josh to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Millionaire Boys Club
programme.desc: 48 Hours is television's most popular true-crime series, investigating shocking cases and compelling real-life dramas with journalistic integrity and cutting-edge style.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Getting Away with Murder?
programme.desc: A report on families who have experienced the violent death of a loved one and believe they know the identity of the killer but lack evidence to back the charge.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Sugar Land Conspiracy
programme.desc: In December 2003, the Whitaker family-- Kent, his wife Tricia, and their sons, Bart and Kevin-- returned home from dinner. Upon entering the house, Kevin and Tricia were fatally shot. The investigation revealed that the murders had been planned by Bart.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A missing woman is found dead in Texas; interviews with her family, friends, investigators, and boyfriend.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Full Moon
programme.desc: In August 1996, Yvette Rodier and Zach Snarr went to the mountains for their date to take photos of the full moon, when a stranger drove up, pulled out a gun and opened fire. Zach was killed. Yvette, shot four times, survived by pretending to be dead.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Who Killed the Prosecutor?
programme.desc: Steve Tauzer, a prominent assistant district attorney in Kern County, CA, was found murdered in his garage. Chris Hillis, a former police officer, a colleague and friend of Tauzer, was arrested for the murder. Chris’ son Lance was key to the case.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon’s niece has to be retrieved by Garfield and Odie. Garfield gets confidence from a motivational speaker.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Skyway Robbery/The Bunny Rabbits Coming/Close Encounters of the Garfield Kind
programme.desc: Jon decides to fly Swindler Airlines to Miami./A mysterious message arrives./A friendly alien lands in Jon's backyard.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Squeak Previews/U.S Acres: Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Wade/A Tall Tale
programme.desc: Two mice critics review a documentary./Wade is mistakenly hypnotized to turn into a monster./The network insists that Nermal tell a story.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Fraidy Cat/U.S. Acres: Shell Shocked Sheldon/Nothing to Sneeze At
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie watch a horror film./Orson decides to hatch Sheldon./Garfield has a sneezing attack.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield tests the audience. Orson offers his version of “The Rooser.”

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Binky Gets Cancelled Again/Orson's Diner/Flat Tired
programme.desc: Binky loses his show to The Buddy Bears./Orson and Wade open a diner./Garfield is too tired to do the show.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Weighty Problem/U.S. Acres: The Worm Turns/Good Cat, Bad Cat
programme.desc: Garfield tampers with the new talking scale./Booker's hunt for worms comes to a stop./Garfield's good and bad side battle for control.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Legend of the Lake/Double-Oh Orson/The Black Book
programme.desc: Garfield lectures a group about a famous water voyage./Orson imagines himself a famous secret agent./Jon gives Garfield his "little black book" to hide.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield's Moving Experience/U.S. Acres: Wade: You're Afraid/Good Mousekeeping
programme.desc: Garfield decides to move away from home./Orson hypnotizes Wade./Garfield must rid the house of mice.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Orpheus
programme.desc: Jim Phelps assumes a risky pose as a drug addict with information to sell to get behind the Iron Curtain where he seeks to stop an unknown assassin from killing an unknown victim on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Crane
programme.desc: After rescuing a prisoner from execution by a dictator (guest star Carl Betz), the IMF has to find a hiding place so conspicuous it will be overlooked by police hunting the fugitive on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Death Squad
programme.desc: Jim Phelps leads the IMF to aid one of its own members when Barney is arrested and marked for execution by a sadistic police chief (guest star Pernell Roberts) on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Choice
programme.desc: Paris is marked for execution when he impersonates a power-mad mystic trying to win control of a friendly country by hypnotizing its woman ruler on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Martyr
programme.desc: To keep a student congress from being used as a rubber stamp by a repressive premier (John Larch), the IMF sets Phelps up for capture so he can betray Paris as a turncoat student leader on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Friends the Doctor
programme.desc: Time for a check-up! Barney helps his friends discover the world of doctors and dentists as they learn about healthy habits like brushing teeth, getting checkups, eating healthy foods and getting exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: All Aboard
programme.desc: Kami, one of Barney's youngest friends, has trouble keeping up with the other kids and she's tired of always being last. She's not having a very good day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Ahora Mismo!
programme.desc: When Ben arrives too late to get a pony ride he must learn how to wait the hard way. He's always wanted a horse and now it looks as if he's missed his opportunity. Luckily, Barney takes him to Spain where they meet Regalo, a dancing horse!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A-Counting We Will Go!
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Baby Bop count to ten by playing games, and visiting a Make-Believe Market.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bonjour Barney!
programme.desc: Emma wants to paint an award-winning painting for the "Art In The Park Show," but she is just isn't satisfied with her artwork. Barney takes her to France to learn how to paint from his friend Pierre.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Family and Me
programme.desc: The children are invited to a family picnic in the park, but don't know who invited them. The invitations instruct them to bring a family treasure, so each child has something special with them. Barney helps lead a discussion about families.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Baby Bop thinks the half-moon is somehow broken, Barney and Friends take an imaginary visit to the moon where Barney eases her concerns.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bienvenido, Barney!
programme.desc: Baby Bop's friend Monty the butterfly passes through the park with a flock of friends on their way to Mexico. When Monty gets left behind by his insect friends and family, Barney takes everyone on a visit to Mexico.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: In Memory
programme.desc: Lili wakes up, supposedly on Earth after a coma, and is told the Jaridians have come and conquered the Taelons. She remembers Sandoval telling her she no longer has and Earth-based physiology and believes things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Cloister
programme.desc: Zo'or and Da'an travel to a cloister for an energy sharing ceremony, but one of the sisters is killed and everyone is a suspect.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Interview
programme.desc: Zo'or agrees to do a live television interview to try to endear himself to humans, but the show's producer has an ulterior motive in getting him in front of a camera.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keep Your Enemies Closer
programme.desc: The shuttle Liam and Zo'or are in crashes over wilderness, but survive in safety bubbles. The people they meet live off the earth and know nothing of the Taelons. However, Zo'or is injured and missing a Synod meeting on the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Subterfuge
programme.desc: Sandoval has a mole attempting to gain information about Liam - particularly concerning his commitment to the Taelons. When a Taelon and protector are killed in a portal that malfunctions, Liam is suspicious that it was intentional.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Bombings begin at embassies and Liam believes they may reignite the SI (Sino-Indian) War, which ended with an armistice several years before. An old intelligence agency friend of Renee's has interesting holographic technology.

programme.title: The Lost World: Suspicion

programme.title: The Lost World: The Imposters
programme.desc: The explorers seek out a portal, but are overtaken by a force that replaces Marguerite, Roxton, and Challenger with three demons. With an age of chaos impending, Finn must bring back her friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Elixir
programme.desc: Challenger tests his nutritional elixir, but the drink causes hallucinations of his wife and younger self to appear in the treehouse. The others must find a cure before his visions become deadly.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tapestry
programme.desc: Challenger is taken captive by a WWI transport pilot guarding a crashed plane full of stolen iridium ingots. He, Roxton, and Marguerite relive their deepest secrets, each connected to the cargo.

programme.title: The Lost World: Legacy
programme.desc: An old enemy returns with a powerful artifact that could give him total power over the plateau. Veronica believes that her mother's pendant is leading her back to her parents.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla
programme.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Justice For Sheila?
programme.desc: This report offers fresh insight into the brutal murder of Sheila Bellush, a Sarasota, Florida mother of quadruplets who was killed in front of her children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Tacoma Confidential
programme.desc: A report on corruption and a cover-up by city officials of Tacoma, Washington, focusing on David Brame, the city’s police chief who rose to power despite a shady past.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The War in Chicago
programme.desc: The street violence, gang activity and drug trafficking in Chicago.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Who Killed the Prosecutor?
programme.desc: Steve Tauzer, a prominent assistant district attorney in Kern County, CA, was found murdered in his garage. Chris Hillis, a former police officer, a colleague and friend of Tauzer, was arrested for the murder. Chris’ son Lance was key to the case.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The investigation into the shooting death of retired NYPD officer Patrick Gilhuley, including interviews with jury members and a deconstruction of forensic evidence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: OJ Simpson: Endgame
programme.desc: The OJ Simpson trial for the murder of Nicole Brown Simpson and Ron Goldman, the controversy that surrounded it, the impact it had on race relations, including the current and recent uproar over race, patriotism, and free speech in America.
